title: 8 Month Questionnaire
/COMMUNICATION/questions/0/question: If you call to your baby when you are out of sight, does she look in the direction of your voice?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/1/question: When a loud noise occurs, does your baby turn to see where the sound came from?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/2/question: If you copy the sounds your baby makes, does your baby repeat the same sounds back to you?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/3/question: Does your baby make sounds like “da,” “ga,” “ka,” and “ba”?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/4/question: Does your baby respond to the tone of your voice and stop his activity at least briefly when you say “no-no” to him?
/COMMUNICATION/questions/5/question: Does your baby make two similar sounds like “ba-ba,” “da-da,” or “ga-ga”? (The sounds do not need to mean anything.)
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/0/question: When you put your baby on the floor, does she lean on her hands while sitting? (If she already sits up straight without leaning on her hands, mark “yes” for this item.)
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/1/question: Does your baby roll from his back to his tummy, getting both arms out from under him?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/2/question: Does your baby get into a crawling position by getting up on her hands and knees?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/3/question: If you hold both hands just to balance your baby, does he support his own weight while standing?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/4/question: When sitting on the floor, does your baby sit up straight for several minutes without using her hands for support?
/GROSS MOTOR/questions/5/question: When you stand your baby next to furniture or the crib rail, does he hold on without leaning his chest against the furniture for support?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/0/question: Does your baby reach for a crumb or Cheerio and touch it with her finger or hand? (If she already picks up a small object, mark “yes” for this item.)
/FINE MOTOR/questions/1/question: Does your baby pick up a small toy, holding it in the center of his hand with his fingers around it?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/2/question: Does your baby try to pick up a crumb or Cheerio by using her thumb and all of her fingers in a raking motion, even if she isn’t able to pick it up? (If she already picks up a crumb or Cheerio, mark “yes” for this item.)
/FINE MOTOR/questions/3/question: Does your baby pick up a small toy with only one hand?
/FINE MOTOR/questions/4/question: Does your baby successfully pick up a crumb or Cheerio by using his thumb and all of his fingers in a raking motion? (If he already picks up a crumb or Cheerio, mark “yes” for this item.)
/FINE MOTOR/questions/5/question: Does your baby pick up a small toy with the tips of her thumb and fingers? (You should see a space between the toy and her palm.)
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/0/question: Does your baby pick up a toy and put it in his mouth?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/1/question: When your baby is on her back, does she try to get a toy she has dropped if she can see it?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/2/question: Does your baby play by banging a toy up and down on the floor or table?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/3/question: Does your baby pass a toy back and forth from one hand to the other?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/4/question: Does your baby pick up two small toys, one in each hand, and hold onto them for about 1 minute?
/PROBLEM SOLVING/questions/5/question: When holding a toy in his hand, does your baby bang it against another toy on the table?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/0/question: When lying on her back, does your baby play by grabbing her foot?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/1/question: When in front of a large mirror, does your baby reach out to pat the mirror?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/2/question: Does your baby try to get a toy that is out of reach? (He may roll, pivot on his tummy, or crawl to get it.)
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/3/question: While your baby is on her back, does she put her foot in her mouth?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/4/question: Does your baby drink water, juice, or formula from a cup while you hold it?
/PERSONAL-SOCIAL/questions/5/question: Does your baby feed himself a cracker or a cookie?
